verses.verse: I will exalt<WH7311> you,<WH430> my God, the King.<WH4428> I will praise<WH1288> your name<WH8034> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5769>
Every day<WH3117> I will praise<WH1288> you.<WH1984> I will extol your name<WH8034> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5769>
Great<WH1419> is Yahweh,<WH3068> and greatly<WH3966> to be praised!<WH1984> His greatness<WH1420> is unsearchable.<WH2714>
One<WH1755> generation<WH1755> will commend<WH7623> your works<WH4639> to another,<WH5046> and will declare your mighty acts.<WH1369>
Of the glorious<WH3519> majesty<WH3519> of your honor,<WH1926> of your wondrous<WH6381> works,<WH1697> I will meditate.<WH7878>
Men will speak<WH559> of the might<WH5807> of your awesome acts.<WH3372> I will declare<WH5608> your greatness.<WH1420>
They will utter<WH5042> the memory<WH2143> of your great<WH7227> goodness,<WH2898> and will sing<WH7442> of your righteousness.<WH6666>
Yahweh<WH3068> is gracious,<WH2587> merciful,<WH7349> slow<WH750> to anger,<WH639> and of great<WH1419> loving kindness.<WH2617>
Yahweh<WH3068> is good<WH2896> to all.<WH7356> His tender mercies are over all his works.<WH4639>
All your works<WH4639> will give thanks<WH3034> to you,<WH3068> Yahweh. Your saints<WH2623> will extol you.<WH1288>
They will speak<WH559> of the glory<WH3519> of your kingdom,<WH4438> and talk<WH1696> about your power;<WH1369>
to make known<WH3045> to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> his mighty acts,<WH1369> the glory<WH3519> of the majesty<WH3519> of his kingdom.<WH4438>

Your kingdom<WH4438> is an everlasting<WH5769> kingdom.<WH4438> Your dominion<WH4475> endures throughout all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755> Yahweh is faithful in all his words, and loving in all his deeds.
Yahweh<WH3068> upholds<WH5564> all who fall,<WH5307> and raises up<WH2210> all those who are bowed down.<WH3721>
The eyes<WH5869> of all wait<WH7663> for you.<WH5414> You give them their food<WH400> in due season.<WH6256>
You open<WH6605> your hand,<WH3027> and satisfy<WH7646> the desire<WH7522> of every living thing.<WH2416>
Yahweh<WH3068> is righteous<WH6662> in all his ways,<WH1870> and gracious<WH2623> in all his works.<WH4639>
Yahweh<WH3068> is near<WH7138> to all those who call<WH7121> on him,<WH7121> to all who call on him in truth.<WH571>
He will fulfill<WH6213> the desire<WH7522> of those who fear<WH3373> him.<WH8085> He also will hear their cry,<WH7775> and will save them.<WH3467>
Yahweh<WH3068> preserves<WH8104> all those who love<WH157> him,<WH7563> but all the wicked he will destroy.<WH8045>
My mouth<WH6310> will speak<WH1696> the praise<WH8416> of Yahweh.<WH3068> Let all flesh<WH1320> bless<WH1288> his holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> forever<WH5703> and ever.<WH5769>
